item.title: Loop Industries Inc 10-K
item.description: Loop Industries Inc, which is in the Chemicals & Allied Products [2800] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 01, 2021 had 27139 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 291 instances stock - 250 instances may - 218 instances february - 214 instances loop - 188 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
